outkast: hi-errr this is the captain ... speaking we are now descending into hartsfield international airport id like to welcome you to atlanta we have clear blue skies over atlanta which by the way is the home of the atlanta hawks the braves and the falcons to the far left you can see the georgia dome which by the way still flies the confederate battle flag  atlanta has been called the new motown of the south and is the home of laface records organized noize productions  if you look to your far right you can see decatur and below you to the right is east point and college park home of the red dogs rap cats and robbin crew and home to the player the lacs and the motherfuckin outkast
